execute_process(
  COMMAND git show -s --format=%cd --date=format:%B\ %Y
  WORKING_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}"
  OUTPUT_VARIABLE SCIPP_RELEASE_MONTH
  OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE
)

set(GENERATED_FILE_WARNING
    "DO NOT EDIT! This file is generated by CMake, edit 'index.rst.in' instead"
)

configure_file(index.rst.in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/index.rst)
